input_email_body:
Subject: Problem during Chef PostgreSQL Integration

Hello Customer Support, I am encountering difficulties with the Chef PostgreSQL integration. The process halted while syncing data You can reach me at fatima.farsi@help.com.. It seems the issue could be related to incompatible API versions or incorrect setup My name is Elena Ivanova.. After restarting services, reviewing logs, and validating credentials, the problem still exists. I would greatly appreciate any assistance in addressing this. Please inform me if you need additional details from me.
